QAData.question: Who won between West Ham United and Crystal Palace on Sun, 06 Nov 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace won 2–1 over West Ham United on Sun, 06 Nov 2022 14:00:00 GMT.
